title: Shemale Nights
description: SUPER HOT ACTION WITHIN  Mark’s a 28 year-old loner from London who’s quit the family business, given up his flat and is estranged from his parents. All he lives for are his sexual fantasies which he’s about to turn into reality. Mark escapes to South East Asia where he encounters the ladyboys of his dreams. However, he soon realises that some fantasies are best left unfulfilled, and that sometimes you can never truly escape from your past.  WARNING: CONTAINS SIZZLING, SEXUALLY EXPLICIT MATERIAL. AGES 18+
author: P.M. Pine
